name: Gulon
description: The Gulon is a large, agile creature with a robust build, displaying formidable physical characteristics. Its body is adapted to slip through tight spaces without difficulty.
memorable: Its ability to belch toxic gas in a large area can significantly harm multiple foes.
goals: To ambush prey and navigate through tight spaces while dealing damage.
relations: Might be encountered with other monstrous creatures that share similar habitats.
environment: Typically found in areas with tight passages or difficult terrain.
strengths: High Strength enhances its melee attack effectiveness and the Amorphous ability allows it to navigate confined areas easily.
weaknesses: Low Intelligence and Charisma reduce its effectiveness in social interactions and mental defenses.
attacks: Employs Multiattack with a Bite that can knock foes prone and Claw strikes that deal slashing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Too Full allows it to unleash a dangerous cloud of toxic gas that deals significant poison damage in a wide area.
senses: Possesses Keen Smell, granting advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.
skills: Proficient in Stealth, enhancing its ability to ambush.
additional_information: Immunity to poison damage and conditions.
Leaves difficult terrain when moving through narrow spaces.
High Constitution contributes to robust hit points.
Can deliver three attacks in one turn.
Uncomplicated intelligence makes it a straightforward brute force creature.
test_queries: formidable large monster with toxic gas
large monstrosity that navigates tight spaces
brute force creature with keen smell ability
